argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | istrg.1 | |- M = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 2 |  | istdrg.1 | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_elin | |- ( R e. ( TopRing i^i DivRing ) <-> ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_anbi1i | |- ( ( R e. ( TopRing i^i DivRing ) /\ ( M |`s U ) e. TopGrp ) <-> ( ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing ) /\ ( M |`s U ) e. TopGrp ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( mulGrp ` r ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ( mulGrp ` r ) = M ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( Unit ` r ) = ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 8 | 7, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> ( Unit ` r ) = U ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( r = R -> ( ( mulGrp ` r ) |`s ( Unit ` r ) ) = ( M |`s U ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( r = R -> ( ( ( mulGrp ` r ) |`s ( Unit ` r ) ) e. TopGrp <-> ( M |`s U ) e. TopGrp ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_df-tdrg | |- TopDRing = { r e. ( TopRing i^i DivRing ) | ( ( mulGrp ` r ) |`s ( Unit ` r ) ) e. TopGrp } |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( R e. TopDRing <-> ( R e. ( TopRing i^i DivRing ) /\ ( M |`s U ) e. TopGrp ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_df-3an | |- ( ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing /\ ( M |`s U ) e. TopGrp ) <-> ( ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing ) /\ ( M |`s U ) e. TopGrp ) ) |
| 14 | 4, 12, 13 | #P_3bitr4i | |- ( R e. TopDRing <-> ( R e. TopRing /\ R e. DivRing /\ ( M |`s U ) e. TopGrp ) ) |
